turns.content: Have there been any successful industrial start-ups in Częstochowa in recent years? If so, how have they impacted the city's economy?

It's great to see the city's government and organizations putting effort into supporting new businesses. Do you think there are any specific industries that could benefit from more start-up support in Częstochowa?
